title: v0.10.7: WinXP x86 panic: Failed to find CreateSymbolicLinkW procedure in kernel32.dll

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
I had v0.10.6 and hit the upgrade button from the web interface. Now the v0.10.7 binary crashes.

I've tried a clean download with no configs and the same thing happens.

Heres the entire cmd output:
# 

Microsoft Windows XP [Version 5.1.2600](C) Copyright 1985-2001 Microsoft Corp.

C:\Documents and Settings\Gabi>"C:\Documents and Settings\Gabi\Desktop\syncthing
\syncthing.exe"
panic: Failed to find CreateSymbolicLinkW procedure in kernel32.dll: The specifi
ed procedure could not be found.

goroutine 16 [running]:
runtime.panic(0x7eaee0, 0x11212360)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/panic.c:279 +0xe9
syscall.(_LazyProc).mustFind(0x112122e0)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/syscall/dll_windows.go:258 +0x60
syscall.(_LazyProc).Addr(0x112122e0, 0x1e)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/syscall/dll_windows.go:265 +0x2e
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/symlinks.Create(0x111e4ab0, 0x2a, 0x111e
4a50, 0x1e, 0x4000, 0x0, 0x0)
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/symlinks/symlink_windows
.go:176 +0x241
github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/symlinks.init┬╖1()

        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/model/util.go:45 +0x5c
main.init()
        /go/src/github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/syncthing/usage_report.go:148
 +0xe3

goroutine 19 [finalizer wait]:

runtime.parkunlock(0xb852f8, 0xb83da9)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:1385 +0x3f
runfinq()
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/mgc0.c:2644 +0xc5

text/template/parse.lexText(0x111e6200, 0x9545c0)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/text/template/parse/lex.go:228 +0x26f
text/template/parse.(*lexer).run(0x111e6200)

created by text/template/parse.lex
